abstract: Security companies are doing a better job at surrounding computers with defenses. Now the fight has moved far inside the machine, where unwanted or malicious software is nearly impossible to detect.

headline.main: Lenovo and Superfish Penetrate the Heart of a Computer’s Security
headline.print_headline: Spyware in Lenovo PCs Is Placed at Core of System

snippet: Security companies are doing a better job at surrounding computers with defenses. Now the fight has moved far inside the machine, where unwanted or malicious software is nearly impossible to detect.
